episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch00:
An important ticket of
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s was suddenly blown
away by a gust of strong wind.

When [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was at a loss because [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] couldn’t
chase down the ticket...
Leave it to me!

Skyla flew off and got the ticket for
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
Here! Everything OK?
A pilot needs sharp eyes.

They let us see things clearly, no matter how far
away they are!
(Thank Skyla.)
You’re welcome! I’m glad I could be of help.

(Put the ticket away so it doesn’t fly
off again.)
Yeah, that might be a good idea!
Hee hee, the wind played a trick on you, didn’t it?

But for me, it was a tailwind that helped me get
your ticket.

The most important thing for a pilot is how you get
the wind to be your friend!
(Ask how that feels.)

Oh! I can see from your expression that you’re
super interested!

(Eagerly show your interest by saying
it sounds fun.)

Yup, it’s super fun—just about as fun as
Pokémon battling!

The way the wind feels when you’re on the
ground and when you’re in the sky is completely
different.
If I were to explain it with words...
Hmmm, you know, I’m not sure I can.

Oh! Actually, I could just show you! Would you like
to go flying together?
I know just the thing!
Come on, let’s take wing over Pasio!

Skyla and [Name:PlayerNickname ] boarded
a blimp.
I like high places, so I often ride this on my own...

But it’s been a while since I’ve had a relaxing
flight with someone else like this.

I wish more people could experience how it feels
to fly so freely across the sky...

Just then, a gust of wind blew through the
gondola...
How did that wind feel?
(Say it felt nice.)
I thought so too!
(Say it felt cool.)
That sounds kind of nice!

It looks like the winds were kind to you today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].

Flying together, taking in the same view, feeling
the same winds...

I’ve actually been planning to invite you on a
flight for a while.

To be honest, I was hoping that ride would be on
something faster, like a plane...
but I thought this would be better for chatting.

You’re able to quickly become friends with
others.

I think the reason for that is because when you
talk to people, you meet them at their level.

I started doing that same thing, and now I’ve had
more fun interactions.

Since I learned that from you, I wanted to show
you the view I see all the time.
I’m so happy I got to fly with you today!
But the wind is fickle, and likely to change.
If you ever want to feel that change for yourself...
we should fly together again sometime!
